title: NPE on proxySelector.select
body:
Somehow `proxySelector` was null during a test run.

``` java
      List<Proxy> proxyList = proxySelector.select(uri);
```

```
Tests run: 6, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 0.003 sec - in com.squareup.okhttp.RequestTest
Running com.squareup.okhttp.CallTest
Exception in thread "OkHttp Dispatcher" java.lang.NullPointerException
```
